figure_3: Spatial distribution of (a) confluence conditions for a HUC 12 and (b) the proportion of confluences in good ecological condition for the HUC 12 units nested within a HUC 8. The HUC 12 highlighted in (b) is depicted in (a). The confluence encircled in black in (a) is discussed in the Results. The HUC 8 in (b) is highlighted in Figure 2. The Google Earth™ image date is February 2, 2019.
